name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Sherry Lynn RYAN, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 224 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1997

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Sherry Lynn RYAN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of September, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, but LIMITED to the issue of whether additional consent or authority was required to seize and read petitioner’s diary and the proper application of Commonwealth v. Parker, 422 Pa.Super. 393, 619 A.2d 735 (1993).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
700 A.2d 1260
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Sherry Lynn RYAN, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 19, 1997.
